column5: Hey ladies & gents...  A few of us from the Hamilton and area contingient of OFC are making a trip to BPS on Wednesday April 18. We plan to go after we are done working, so about 5:30 to 6PM ish.  So far we have Gerritt, Jen and myself in for the trip. If any of you would like to come and do some group shopping it would be more than a pleasure to meet you all.  As well, if you haven't read about Speedtroll and his son Chris, we are going to piece together some tackle and lures to go along with the incredible donations of others to make Chris's life a little bit better.  Corey
If anyone would like to come yet have no transportation, I am more than happy to pick you up along the way, I have room for three more!  Leaving Hamilton around 4:00pm.  Cheers,  Jen

well, going wednesday might just be in the works, Tracker and myself are planning to get up there someday this week, as our schedules are pretty different it makes it hard to plan for a day, would be awesome to meet some of you folks, till further notice...  Bud
Can you pick me up around 4PM Jen?

At this point I will be getting picked up by Jen from my work on the way there, but if enough people want to make a couple of carpools for the trip, I can fit myself and 4 people comfotably in my "Soccer mom Corey minivan".  If I am not mistaken Jen smokes in her truck, as do I smoke in my van, so as long as you don't burn any holes people are welcome to smoke in my mobile as well.  cd.
If you meet me at Corey's work sure Roy!
Sounds like a great idea - count me in  - look forward to meet up with some of you guys   Don

Yup... I will be there! but I will be avoiding the firearms counter!!!!! I dont need Corey tell me to duck because Jen has a .410 pointed in my direction... (for letting her birthday secret out)...LOL  Yah yah if you got some free time stop by a few of us will be there.  PS... the newbies buy Gerritt a beer... it is a OFC rule... it is just an unwritten one... for the time being! lol   PM me for details should you need them.  Gerritt.

It will be nice meeting you Tracker, Corey, and Gerritt!  Just want to clarify, what is a Newbie and how do you decide who that is in a group of OFC'ers?  LOL  Also, Corey made a great suggestion in a post here...  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=4089  He suggested we get together a box and send it off after we all meet up on Wednesday.  Cheers  Jen  p.s.  Gerritt , you have nothing to worry about, I won't be playing with a .410 and they don't sell 9mm amo at BPS.   lol

Well - off hand it looks like hey bud is the closest to a newbie - unless he posts like crazy this week! So I guess he buys the beer Garritt!  LOL Jen - look forward to meeting you and Corey as well   Don
whats a newbie? lol  i used to post on the old forum,  just been lurking foir awhile.. rite joefish  anyways, wednesday is good to go, hope to meet alot of you fine folks there...  Bud

Was there saturday,the deals are far and few between. Lots of Turkey hunting stuff there and there are a couple of rod/reel combos that looked impressive.  I had a gift card to burn so I picked up some odds and sods and I think Im just about complete for the upcoming season of pike and bass. Lucky me also grabbed the last pink finS and sluggos for pike.Hard to find them up here.
well i guess i better find a newer newbie to have go to BPS so i dont have to buy any beers for gerrit lol then i can spend more on fishy type stuff  So who do i get to meet??
getting antsy here...
Gerritt never drinks more than one  heybud...so it won't be toooo expensive for ya !
Ya Wayne - but i'll be there too!  - and I am hey buds ride home!!! LOL  Don
no problem, i drink none, been sober for 6 years, dont plan on startin again! im sure 1 drink wont break my bank.. but im not sposed to talk to strangers
Very much looking forward to meeting all of you ... See you this evening...  Cheers,  Jen
If you leave now you'll have time to pick me up, Jen.
I thought you were meeting me at Corey's work Roy... geeze... now it is too late for me to drive all that way!  Maybe next time!  Although I am sure you will be there in spirit.  Cheers,  Jen
BPS... leavin in 10 minutes!! See ya there!! Bud
